attributes.action: Prevent UK Universities increasing Tuition fee costs to prices between £7-20k
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Universities in England and Wales want a sharp increase in tuition fees of levels between £4k and £20k, whilst some want to remove the cap on university tuition fees completely.  Not only is this madness at a time of global recession, but will deter even more students from poorer families from entering higher education

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
